name: I/O'17  Extended MMUST

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description: Google I/O is an annual developer festival held at the outdoorÂ Shoreline Amphitheatre Mountain View, California in May 17-19, 2017Â  .As GDG MMUST we wish to hold an Extended event to bring local developer communities together to experience the I/O keynotes and sessions with one another in real-time, around the globe. We will also tackle codelabs and demos during that day.
how_to_find_us: You are welcome to have a great experience..!

name: GDD Europe 2017 Extended-MMUST

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description: Google Developer Days(GDD) are global events showcasing the latest developer products and platforms from Google to help you quickly develop high quality apps, grow& retain an active user base and tap into tools to learn more. GDG MMUST has organized an extended event to aid learning about the latest updates to Android, Mobile Web, Machine Learning and IoT through watching the keynote, and tech talks.

name: Local Organizers Coffee Hour-MMUST

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description:
The GDG SSA Community Summit 2017 was a conference that took place in Lagos (Nigeria) on September 22th. It gathered together 100 Google Developer Groups (GDG) organizers and 50 Women Tech Maker (WTM) leaders from Sub-Saharan Africa.

GDG MMUST have organized a meetup to enable GDG MMUST Lead:Nicholus Irungu,who attended this summit, share the knowledge and the organizing skills acquired with the local organizing team. This will enhance the organizing skills of the team and promote growth of theÂ  community.

name: GDG MMUST Weekly Meetup

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description: We normally have tech talks across multiple product areas ranging from Web, Mobile to Cloud, tackle codelabs on the same areas and evaluate the progress.
how_to_find_us: We normally hold our Friday meetups at the Science Pack building 004 (SPD) in Main Campus

name: Android Studyjam'18 MMUST

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description:
â€¢ What we'll do
The core objective is to give Android fundamentals.
We shall take the attendees through the installation of Android Studio, gradle configuration, and how to test/run the apps on Android phones and on Emulator. We shall also sensitize on the essence of github accounts to allow for collaboration with other developers.

â€¢ What to bring
Bring your laptops and Ethernet cables for maximum experience.

â€¢ Important to know
Jammers are expected to be consistent in attendance since every session will cover a unique concept.
how_to_find_us: The venue for GDG Events has always been SPD004.

name: Cloud Study Jam'18-MMUST

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description:
â€¢ What we'll do
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin?
Join GDG MMUST for the Cloud Study Jam! Together we'll work through three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs, then you will get free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you additional badges.
Join this meetup to get official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge.

â€¢ What to bring
Bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed.

â€¢ Important to know
Take note that this is an official Google training, a $70+ value, but will be offered free of charge.The event venue will be SPD 004.

name: Mobile Sites Certification Study Jamâ€™18 MMUST

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description:
â€¢ What we'll do
Mobile now accounts for over half of all web traffic. Users expect their small-screen experiences to be as quick and intuitive as those on desktop. But making the mobile web fast and easy takes some special skills. Join us to create and optimize your mobile website.
The Mobile Sites certification is a professional accreditation that Google offers to individuals who demonstrate proficiency in basic and advanced aspects of mobile website design and development.

â€¢ What to bring
Laptops and Yourself

â€¢ Important to know
You need to have basic web skills to take part. Remember to carry your laptops.
how_to_find_us: The event venue is in the Computer Lab LBB011.

name: International Women's Day(IWD)'2018-Kakamega

venue.name: Kakamega

description:
â€¢ What we'll do
We are proud to be hosting the 2018 International Women's Day Celebration, a women's tech conference with the theme: Building a New Horizon.The event will highlight the stories of our growing female community of designers, developers, and technology entrepreneurs.

â€¢ What to bring
Bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook), a notebook and a pen.

â€¢ Important to know
We also invite men to come and appreciate the contributions and influence women in technology have made in the tech industry.

name: I/O Extended 2018

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description:
What we'll do
Google I/O features latest developer products ,code labs and technological talks given by industry specialists. Come one, come all to I/O Extended 2018 MMUST!!

â€¢ What to bring
Laptops and a Laptop Charger

name: Developer Student Club (DSC) Android Workshop

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description:
Developer Student Club(DSC) is a Google Developers program for university students, designed to help them build their mobile and web development skills open to all students ranging from novice to advanced developers.
This will be the first workshop focusing on android development this saturday.
Join us this saturday to learn more on android technologies.

Bring your laptop and charger with you. Prior knowledge on android is not a prerequisite.

name: DSC Design Thinking Workshop

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description:
DSC is a Google Developers program for University students, designed to help them build their mobile and web development skills and knowledge. It is open to any student, ranging from novice developers who are just starting, to advanced developers who want to further improve their skills. It is intended to be a space for students to learn and collaborate as they solve mobile and web development problems.

DSC MMUST is presenting to you the introductory and Design Thinking workshop.
Join us and come to learn how to draw clear solutions and prototypes from a problem clearly.

name: DSC Android Beginner BootCamp

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description:
Do you have zero or little programming experience? Then this is the right place for you to be . Join us from Monday 1st to Friday 5th to learn on android programming.
Starting from installations to developing a basic application.

Please bring a laptop and laptop charger with you.

The meetup mainly focuses on android beginners, prior knowledge on programming is not key.
how_to_find_us: Join us at LBB 011 from 4:00 pm  to 6:00pm daily from 1st to 5th October

name: DSC MMUST Internal Showcase - Tech for a Change

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description: The DSC teams will be showcasing their ongoing projects to get feedback and gauge the progress.

name: Google Cloud Study Jam

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam!

Get official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through 4 Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the cloud console, Kubernetes and Machine Learning.

Then after the meetup, you will have free access to 3 more labs you can finish at home. Complete all 7 labs and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile.

Bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed.

name: Git and Github Workshop

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description:
Ever wanted to contribute to open source and didn't know where to start?
Well, Dsc Mmust is here to your rescue.
Join us on Saturday and get trained on how to use git and github to collaborate on your projects.
Bring a laptop and a laptop charger with you.

name: Kotlin Codelabs and Flutter Intro

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description:
Who said android applications can only be written in java?
If Java is not your cup of coffee , some good news for you ðŸ˜‰ðŸ˜‰ You can use Kotlin to develop your Android apps too.
Flutter, making it possible for devs to develop a single app that can be deployed to ios or androi. Cool isn't it??

Join us this Saturday and get exposed to these new technologies. An opportunity not to be missed.

See you there.

Bring a laptop and a laptop charger with you.

name: Firebase For Android

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description:
Ever wanted to integrate Firebase to your android apps but seemed like a mountain of work?
Join us this Saturday as we train you how it is simple as ABC.

This is an intermediate workshop thus prerequisite knowledge on android is required.

Carry your laptops and of course Passion to learn. See you there!!

name: HashCode Trainings

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description:
Participating in Hashcode this year?

Join us in breaking data structures and algorithms into simpler and understandable concepts.

Carry your laptop, laptop Charger and enthusiasm to learn.

Get official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge. Together we'll work through 4 Google Cloud labs. You will get hands-on experience with the cloud console, Kubernetes and Machine Learning.

Then after the meetup, you will have free access to 3 more labs you can finish at home. Complete all 7 labs and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile.

name: Devs' Hangout Day ft Allan Juma

venue.name: Masinde Muliro University of Science and Technology

description:
Are you a Software Developer and need to hear from a successful developer in your field?
Ever wanted to integrate Mpesa to your applications but didn't know how??

DSC Mmust introduces an opportunity to chat with Juma Allan, a success Story from ALCWithGoogle.
Join us as he tells us his story and how community actually shaped him and landed him a job.
Carry along a Laptop, Laptop charger and passion to learn more.
